Container.Name: Docker-WebUI
Container.Overview:
This application will list all dockers that have a WebUI.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Olprog59/unraid-templates/main/docker-webui/screen.png
----------------------- Update --------------------------- 31 / 10 / 2021: - Add variable CIRCLE #This variable allows you to set or remove coloured circles.
03 / 11 / 2021: - Do not change the name of the application (Docker-WebUI). I omitted the list with this name. If you change it then you will see it listed. - If you are in version 6.10-rc2 (or newer), you can change the container name by adding an environment variable to each container (HOST_CONTAINERNAME).
